4.eng-name: The Book on the Day of Friday
4.ara-name: كِتَاب الْجُمُعَةِ عَنْ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ

hadiths.text: (Another chain) from Anas, :from the Prophet, similarly

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي وَقْتِ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Time For The Friday Prayer
